author: @allkpop
title: 'We Got Married' stars Jo Kwon and Ga In reunite as the "Adam Couple" for Christmas | allkpop
text:
25
6
News 'We Got Married' stars Jo Kwon and Ga In reunite as the "Adam Couple" for Christmas AKP STAFF Posted by Sophie-Ha 6 hours ago 4,800 news.nate.com The " Adam Couple " singers Jo Kwon and Ga In spent Christmas together.
On December 25, Jo Kwon shared a video on his Instagram with the caption " Fluffy fluttery Merry Christmas ."
The video captured Jo Kwon and Ga In sitting side by side, singing their duet song " I Happen to Love You ." The two displayed chemistry like a real couple, blowing hand hearts to each other and leaning on one another.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by 조권 JOKWON (@kwon_jo)
Upon seeing this, Brown Eyed Girls ' JeA commented, " You should sing a 2025 version ," while fans also showed support for their reunion with comments like "Please reunite the Adam Couple," "This is the best Christmas gift," and "You two look beautiful and match well together."
Jo Kwon and Ga In gained popularity as the "Adam Couple" when they appeared on MBC 's ' We Got Married ' in 2009. The two continued to maintain a close friendship over the years and recently met up to spend quality time together.
SEE ALSO: Lee Min Ho reveals he was a victim of a drunk driving accident and spent nearly 1 year in the hospital
